text: public health emergency management powers amend rsa v to read as follows the commissioner may order a person to undergo such medical care as may be necessary to treat or prevent an incident or threat of disease or other health condition prompting an investigation pursuant to paragraph such care may include immunization of individuals as necessary to prevent the spread of contagious disease except that provided that any immunization requirement shall require a two thirds vote of the legislature that such action is a necessary and appropriate response and provided further that an individual may refuse treatment or immunization pursuant to the provisions of rsa repeal rsa v relative to the cost for maintenance of quarantine is repealed
